summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to tobacco product retailing; defining "tobacco product", eliminating separate licensing for tobacco product vending machine operations, ending site-based regulation of tobacco product mobile retailing, increasing the license fee for tobacco product retailing, changing the punishments for civil infractions, amending SMC 6.240.010-D; -.020, -.040, -.050, -.120, -.200, and SMC 6.204.120; and repealing SMC 6.240.030, -.060, and -.130, all in connection therewith.
